name: Biren Dave
title: Show Host
bio: Hi listeners, I'm Biren and I'm looking forward to bringing you some interesting stories and ideas about science and medicine in season 4 as a show host. In my other life, I'm a second year graduate student in the Department of Molecular Genetics where I study the developmental origins of a pediatric brain cancer at the SickKids Research Institute. Whenever I can find time, I love discovering new running and cycling routes around Toronto!
